name: All Bets Are Off!
description:
Created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Summary:

All Bets Are Off! is a deathmatch arena in which you slice and dice poker chip stacks by means of entangling them with a chain mace in the shape of a die, giving a new meaning to the phrase "rolling dice". 

Do your best to survive 5 minutes, while fending off stacks of chips that are coming to ruin your day.

Earn points either by slowly chipping away at stacks by hitting them with your mace,  dicing them in half using your wire, or by tackling them once your die is entangled to a stack.

  • Blue chips each are worth 100 points.
  • Purple chips are worth 200 points each.
  • By dicing or tackling, you can earn several chips worth of points all at once.

Beware that purple stacks cannot be sliced in half, but rather must be tackled by reeling yourself in towards your mace, once entangled.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys, to move.
  • Spacebar, to deploy or lengthen your mace's wire.
  • Shift, to shorten or fully reel in your mace's wire.
